Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

My name is Todd and I'm from Adelaide, South Australia. I've been playing Kerbal Space Program Demo for about a week now and decided to buy it on Steam since it is on special, I also decided to join the forums. This game is so addictive, I cannot wait until the official Multiplayer Player side of things get added to the game. I'm over the mun in excitement!
Welcome! I've been playing about 1.5 months and largely feel the same way. Best thing I ever played.
And that makes two Australians I've seen. May I point you to Tw1?
